lines.text:
[smashes flies on table with his hand]
One, two, three, four, five, six, seven... I killed seven with one blow! A new record! Hahahahahahahaaa! Hey waiter, bring me some more wine and food, would ya? Hahahaha!

[after eating, Bum realizes he has no money to pay, gets up and tries to leave]
What's this? You leaving? Without paying your bill?
And, and what if I haven't paid? Do you know who I am, huh?
Listen all of you! I happen to be the "One Armed Boxer!" See that? I killed seven! That should be enough for you! Yeah, I killed seven with one blow! Did you ever hear of anyone doing that?
Alright, where are the seven men you killed then?
Well, they weren't exactly men... they were flies!

[Fung Sheng Wu Chi throws flying guillotine at One Armed Bum, decapitating him. Everyone panics and runs. Fung Sheng approaches waiter]
Was he the One Armed Boxer?
He wasn't the One Armed Boxer! He was just a bum!
I don't care who he was. I plan to kill every one armed man I come across here.
Dad, they say the One Armed Boxer is coming here, do you think he might?
He has an invitation... he is very well known... so, I think it would be good... if he could come... just to show himself here.

lines.character: Liu Ti Lung, The One-Armed Boxer

lines.text: If you have patience, you can learn to do all things
lines.character: Liu Ti Lung, The One-Armed Boxer
